structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that contains information about the number of pages, page size, total pages, and total elements of a `Pageable` and its corresponding `Page`. The class uses Lombok to simplify the creation of getters, equals, hashCode, and toString methods. The `of()` method creates a new `PageInfo` object based on a provided `Pageable` and `Page`.

items.description: Is a summary of page numbers, page sizes, total pages, and total elements in a paginated result. The class provides information on the number of pages and size of each page, as well as the total number of pages and elements in the overall result.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Creates a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages, page size, total pages, and total elements for a given `Pageable` and `Page`.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pagination information for the page being processed, providing the page number, page size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing information on its position and size within the overall paginated dataset.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing information about the current page of a paginated result.

items.name: of
